content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 tablespoon canola oil" )

content.text: 1 3/4 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast or thighs, cut in chunks
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 3/4 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast or thighs, cut in chunks" )
( ing-2 "1 large yellow onion, chopped" )
( ing-3 "1 cup sliced celery" )
( ing-4 "1 cup thinly sliced carrots" )
( ing-5 "3 cups no-salt-added chopped tomatoes" )

content.text: 1 (14.25 ounce) can fat-free, less-sodium chicken broth
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (14.25 ounce) can fat-free, less-sodium chicken broth" )
( ing-7 "1 (15 ounce) can no-salt-added black beans" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can no salt-added navy beans
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 (15 ounce) can no salt-added navy beans" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can no salt-added kidney beans
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 (15 ounce) can no salt-added kidney beans" )
( ing-10 "1 cup dry red wine" )
( ing-11 "1 bay leaf" )
( ing-12 "1 tablespoon Italian herbs" )
( ing-13 "1 cup smoked chicken breast, cubed" )
( ing-14 "1 cup fresh Italian parsley, chopped" )
( ing-15 "1 cup fresh cilantro, chopped" )
( ing-16 "salt and pepper" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a large pot; brown chicken.
2) Saute onions until soft, about 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Saute"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onions"@9:15 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until soft"@16:26 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "5 minutes"@34:43 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add broth, beans, tomatoes, celery, carrots, wine, bay leaf, herbs and all the chicken; cover and simmer for 40 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "broth"@7:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "beans"@14:19 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-7 )
			:ref ( ing-8 )
			:ref ( ing-9 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-5 "tomatoes"@21:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "celery"@31:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "carrots"@39:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "wine"@48:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "bay leaf"@54:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "herbs"@64:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "all the chicken"@74:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "cover"@91:96 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "simmer"@101:107 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "40 minutes"@112:122 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add parsley, cilantro, salt and pepper, and simmer 5 more minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "parsley"@7:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-15 "cilantro"@16:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-16 "salt and pepper"@26:41 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "simmer"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "5 more minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
	)
)
